018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.DEFAULT;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PROTECTED;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_STRING;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createText;
027
028import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
029import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGText;
034
035/**
036 *  The wrapper for an
037 *  {@link Element}
038 *  instance that is contained in a
039 *  {@link TypeElement},
040 *  enhanced by information needed for the creation of the UML graph.
041 *
042 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: UMLMemberElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.0.5
045 */
046@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLMemberElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
047@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
048public abstract class UMLMemberElement extends UMLElement
049{
050        /*--------------*\
051    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
052        \*--------------*/
053    /**
054     *  Creates a new {@code UMLMemberElement} instance.
055     *
056     *  @param  element The wrapped element.
057     */
058    protected UMLMemberElement( final Element element )
059    {
060        super( element );
061    }   //  UMLMemberElement()
062
063        /*---------*\
064    ====** Methods **==========================================================
065        \*---------*/
066    /**
067     *  Determines the visibility token for this UML element.
068     *
069     *  @return The visibility token: '+' for a public element, '#' for a
070     *      protected one, '-' for a private, and '~' for package private
071     *      element.
072     */
073    protected final String determineVisibility()
074    {
075        var retValue = EMPTY_STRING;
076        final var modifiers = getModifiers();
077
078        //noinspection IfStatementWithTooManyBranches
079        if( modifiers.contains( PUBLIC ) )
080        {
081            retValue = modifiers.contains( DEFAULT ) ? "\u2A22 " : "+ ";
082        }
083        else if( modifiers.contains( PROTECTED ) )
084        {
085            retValue = "# ";
086        }
087        else if( modifiers.contains( PRIVATE ) )
088        {
089            retValue = "- ";
090        }
091        else
092        {
093            //---* The element is package private *----------------------------
094            retValue = "~ ";
095        }
096
097        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
098        return retValue;
099    }   //  determineVisibility()
100
101    /**
102     *  {@inheritDoc}
103     */
104    @Override
105    public final TypeElement getEnclosingElement() { return (TypeElement) super.getEnclosingElement(); }
106
107    /**
108     *  Renders
109     *  {@link SVGText}
110     *  element that will display this member.
111     *
112     *  @return The text element.
113     */
114    protected SVGText renderSVGText()
115    {
116        final var retValue = createText( toString() );
117
118        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
119        return retValue;
120    }   //  renderSVGText()
121
122    /**
123     *  {@inheritDoc}
124     */
125    @Override
126    public abstract String toString();
127
128    /**
129     *  Returns the
130     *  {@link SVGText}
131     *  element that will display this member.
132     *
133     *  @return The text element.
134     */
135    public final SVGText toText() { return renderSVGText(); }
136}
137//  class UMLMemberElement
138
139/*
140 *  End of File
141 */
